Title: The Path Not Taken
Plot: In order to stop a war Xena must save a princess that has been taken from her home. The kidnapping could lead to a war. Xena realizes that a weapons dealer is the one that has caused everything. When she tracks the dealer, she meets her old love Marcus, but she is not sure how she feels about him.
GuestStars: Bobby Hosea, Stephen Tozer, Iain Rea, Crawford Thompson, Peter Saena-Brown, Christopher Mayer, Danny Lineham, Ross Harper, Sam Holland, Meryl Main, Phaedra Hurst, Christian Hodge, Bill Johnson, John O'Leary, Jimi
